title: On plots having non-buildable/POS reservation/existing amenityand having area less than 4,000 sq
clause_text: On plots having non-buildable/POS reservation/existing amenityand having area less than 4,000 sq. m, 1 toilet and 2 urinals each for ladies and gents maybe constructed.

source_pdf.text_snippet: On plots having non-buildable/POS reservation/existing amenityand having area less than 4,000 sq. m, 1 toilet and 2 urinals each for ladies and gents maybe constructed.
